description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment in (S96a) seeking to allow amendment to provide for the inclusion of a lift shaft on the eastern elevation in relation to planning permission reference PP/2015/5102 dated 20/05/2016 for 'Variation of condition 29 (approved plans) as inserted by non-material amendment Ref PP/2015/3100 to original planning permission P/2008/3284 dated 13/01/2009 for erection of part 5, 6 and 9 storey building with mezzanine floor and basement to form 165 bed hotel with ancillary restaurant/bar and 3434 square metres of B1(a) data centre/office accommodation; alteration to western vehicular access and closure of eastern vehicular access; provision of 39 car parking spaces (including 14 disabled spaces); cycle parking, loading bay and associated landscaping. Amendment to provide for the inclusion of a lift shaft on the eastern elevation, security railings, louvres and access ladders, adjustment to locations of windows on the top floor , an additional fire escape door on the ground floor and alteration to the approved cladding.'
